about_the_game:
Overview

GU Fighters is an action roguelike where you unlock and upgrade new abilities after every round of combat. Play with up to 4 players locally or online to create your own unique build and be the first to win, or go solo/co-op to traverse varying environments and defeat hordes of enemies.

Features

  • Create your own unique build from over 200 unique unlockable abilities and upgrades over the course of a match, including abilities focused on close-range combat, projectiles, grappling, weapon usage, and more.

  • Play locally or online with up to 4 players in intense, explosive rounds where anyone can win! Make risky moves to earn experience and gain new abilities, then play around your opponents' abilities to win the match.

  • Face off in one of over 50 unique maps where you may launch a foe to a new location at any moment. Use the best strategy possible for the current stage, anticipating and planning around any changes in location.

  • Experience a roguelike single-player or local/online co-op mode where you face off against hordes of enemies in various environments. Watch out for dangerous elite and boss fighters that may have their own abilities!

  • Crisp, industry-standard rollback netcode in all multiplayer modes, ensuring the best possible experience for online gameplay.

  • Hop into ranked mode and master your own style of gameplay!

  • Watch and bet on CPU vs CPU matches where you can customize your AI fighter's upgrades and abilities.

name: GU Fighters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 1.4GHz processor
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with at least 200MB of video memory
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: GU Fighters is an action roguelike where you unlock and upgrade new abilities after every round of combat. Play with up to 4 players locally or online to create your own unique build and be the first to win, or go solo/co-op to traverse varying environments and defeat hordes of enemies.
